value:
The Darkling Woods, where I was
born, are very peaceful. Well, they
were...until one day...

Are you doing OK? Oh, no... Don't
worry. It's just that you looked so sad
to me.

Um... I have a request. Would you
mind watching over me while I take a
nap? I don't like sleeping alone.

I was looking at the sky. It's a pretty
kind of blue...$k$pI wonder if it stretches all the way
back to the woods I come from.

I'm Myrrh. I come with greetings from
$Nf...$k$pOh, and hello from me, too.

I've been doing a good job, right?
Oh...you don't need to pet me.

Did this power come from
humans...or monsters?

I'm Myrrh, from Darkling Woods.
What? It's impolite to ask a woman
her age. That's what Ephraim says.$k$pI think you're being rude.

You worry about me a lot, don't you?
I'm fine. I promise.$k$pPeople are born every day. They
laugh, they cry, and someday...they
die. I've seen it so many times...$k$pDragons...are both human and
monster. And so we are also neither,
and part of neither community.$k$pThat used to make me sad. It doesn't
anymore. I think it's better this way.$k$pI will watch over everyone, until the
very end... And I will live with their
memories.$k$pYou work harder than anybody else.
I love to see that. I promise that I will
always, always remember you.
My name's Myrrh. I sensed something ominous, so I left home to pursue it.
Hmph. I think it's very rude to try and sneak up on a lady like that.
This stone is very important. I take great care not to lose it.
Sometimes, in war... We must take up arms against nice people... I grieve for them.
For some reason, when I see you speaking with other people, it makes my chest feel...funny...
Can you tell me how I'll know...if I'm in love?
